Directories

  • images

    This folder contains all the images of Indigo HTML template.

  • css

    This folder contains all the CSS files of Indigo HTML template.

  • js

    This folder has all javascript files for various template features.

  • fonts

    This folder has all fonts used in the template.

  • PHP

    This folder has all php files used in the template.
